name: Julian Ng
bio:
*Versatile Developer ~ Friendly Team Member ~ Patient Teacher ~ Empathetic Mentor*

Full-stack developer with 5+ years of experience in both service-based and product-based software companies. Some key projects/achievements include:
* Built several new features for Starling Bank to grow and enhance their services to customers.
* Extracted David Lloydâ€™s legacy monolith systems into modern, fast and modular microservices.
* Created a tool at Boolean to provide students with an overview of their progress with course exercises.
* Mentored several co-workers who sought support for professional and life matters.
